thread.title: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Reuniting On Screen After 7 Years
thread.title_full: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Reuniting On Screen After 7 Years

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Abhishek Bachchan & Aishwarya Rai Are Reuniting On Screen After 7 Years
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 27 . 2017 Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Abhishek Bachchan 
Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai are one of the best couples we have in Btown. They are stylish, look admirable together and of course, are too much in love! They have done a few movies together and evidently share a comfortable chemistry â€“ as we all saw in Guru , Raavan and Kuch Naa Kaho etc. (My personal favourite is the item song Kajra Re , in case you are wondering!) 
If you are an # AbhiAsh fan like us, you will be pleased to know that the two are likely to team up for Gulab Jamun , which is being produced by Anurag Kashyap . Although their is no official statement about the project, we hear that it is being directed by a newcomer. 
Super excited to see these two reunite after 7 long years! What about you guys? 0
